text:
Senior and Younger #Journalists are losing their lives to #COVID19 daily. We offer our condolences to the families.

When will they be #vaccinated  and designated as "#FrontlineWarriors"? Every second matters. 

#VaccineForMedia #CovidIndia #Vaccine

@KotaNeelima @drharshvardhan https://t.co/ZWt7n1ErBL
